languages.text: {n}Повисает пауза. Хейнрикс смотрит на вас со странным выражением. Затем вздыхает и вновь проводит пальцами по вашей щеке.{/n} "Спасибо, что справилась обо мне, но тебе не обязательно торчать здесь со мной. Вскоре я приведу себя в порядок и вернусь к остальным, обещаю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Повисает пауза. Хейнрикс смотрит на вас со странным выражением. Затем вздыхает и вновь проводит пальцами по вашей щеке.{/n} "Спасибо, что справилась обо мне, но тебе не обязательно торчать здесь со мной. Вскоре я приведу себя в порядок и вернусь к остальным, обещаю".

languages.text: {n}Silence hangs in the air. Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."
languages.original_text: {n}Повисает пауза. Хейнрикс смотрит на вас со странным выражением. Затем вздыхает и вновь проводит пальцами по вашей щеке.{/n} "Спасибо, что справилась обо мне, но тебе не обязательно торчать здесь со мной. Вскоре я приведу себя в порядок и вернусь к остальным, обещаю".

Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."

{n}Silence hangs in the air. Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."

{n}Silence hangs in the air. Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."

{n}Silence hangs in the air. Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."

languages.text: {n}周围一片寂静。海因里希以古怪的神色看着你，但随后叹了口气，再次用手指拂过你的脸颊。{/n}“谢谢你来检查我的情况，但你没必要和我一起留在这里。用不了多久，我就会振作起来，与其他人会合。我保证。”
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs in the air. Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}周围一片寂静。海因里希以古怪的神色看着你，但随后叹了口气，再次用手指拂过你的脸颊。{/n}“谢谢你来检查我的情况，但你没必要和我一起留在这里。用不了多久，我就会振作起来，与其他人会合。我保证。”

languages.text: {n}Se produce el silencio. Heinrix te mira con gesto extraño, después suspira y vuelve a acariciar tu mejilla.{/n} «Gracias por venir a verme, pero no tiene por qué quedarse. Me recompondré y me reuniré con los demás enseguida, lo prometo».
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs in the air. Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se produce el silencio. Heinrix te mira con gesto extraño, después suspira y vuelve a acariciar tu mejilla.{/n} «Gracias por venir a verme, pero no tiene por qué quedarse. Me recompondré y me reuniré con los demás enseguida, lo prometo».

languages.text: {n}静寂が漂う。ハインリックスは不思議そうな表情であなたを見ていたが、ため息をつき、再びあなたの頬を指でなぞった。{/n}「俺のことを心配してくれてありがとう。すぐに元通りにして、みんなと合流するよ、約束する」
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs in the air. Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}静寂が漂う。ハインリックスは不思議そうな表情であなたを見ていたが、ため息をつき、再びあなたの頬を指でなぞった。{/n}「俺のことを心配してくれてありがとう。すぐに元通りにして、みんなと合流するよ、約束する」

languages.text: {n}Le silence s'installe. Heinrix vous regarde avec une expression étrange, puis il soupire et vous caresse de nouveau la joue.{/n} « Merci de vous être inquiétée pour moi, mais ce n'est pas la peine de vous apitoyer sur mon sort. Je rejoindrai les autres dès que je me serai remis, je vous le promets. »
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs in the air. Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le silence s'installe. Heinrix vous regarde avec une expression étrange, puis il soupire et vous caresse de nouveau la joue.{/n} « Merci de vous être inquiétée pour moi, mais ce n'est pas la peine de vous apitoyer sur mon sort. Je rejoindrai les autres dès que je me serai remis, je vous le promets. »

languages.text: {n}Schweigen hängt in der Luft. Heinrix sieht dich sonderbar an, seufzt dann und streicht dir dann wieder sanft die Wange.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr nach mir gesehen habt, aber Ihre müsst hier nicht in Selbstmitleid mit mir schwelgen. Ich werde mich zusammenreißen und bald zurück den anderen gehen, versprochen."
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs in the air. Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schweigen hängt in der Luft. Heinrix sieht dich sonderbar an, seufzt dann und streicht dir dann wieder sanft die Wange.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr nach mir gesehen habt, aber Ihre müsst hier nicht in Selbstmitleid mit mir schwelgen. Ich werde mich zusammenreißen und bald zurück den anderen gehen, versprochen."

languages.text: {n}Ortama sessizlik hâkim oluyor. Heinrix, yüzünde tuhaf bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor. Ardından iç çekerek parmaklarını bir kez daha yanağında gezdiriyor.{/n} "Beni kontrol etmeye geldiğin için teşekkür ederim ama benimle birlikte burada eziyet çekmek zorunda değilsin. Bir an önce kendimi toparlayıp diğerlerine katılacağım. Söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs in the air. Heinrix looks at you with a strange expression, then he sighs and brushes his fingers across your cheek again.{/n} "Thank you for checking up on me, but you don't need to wallow here with me. I'll put myself back together and rejoin the others soon, I promise."
